description.value:
As a minor action you can spend 1 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point to target a creature within 30ft of you that you can see with one of the following effects:

 

Glorify: The target becomes @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.ZOBZ8V2YME5YOYZR]{🦁 Lionized} for 10 minutes.


Vilify: The target becomes @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} for 1 minute.
